entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:07 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -36.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whale Cove Airport 1:00 PM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -36.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -39.7°C
Wind: NNW 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 55 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 11 February 2023
